I switched between dynamic joints for grandparents, and multijoint system.

For me it seems that multijoint system seems to be  more realistic. It removes some physical bugs on some parts but still leds parts bend a little. Dynamic joint system doesn't allow parts bend at all which might give some weird results when you except gravity to bend some parts but they stick straight.

im using grandparent but  ya the auto struts do feel a little over powered right now they might need to be lowered a little i would like a little flex right now even the biggest rockets stay lazer stright
I am trying to understand, we can use the previous patch's joint connection via setting?
